archimate:Requirement.name: PA.2.3.3a: a) determining how app security is measured (e.g. vulnerabilities per lines of code; number of high, medium and low vulnerabilities; total number of vulnerabilities)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
